title: Top beef stew
ingredients: ['800g diced beef', '300g carrots, chopped', '200g garden peas', '1/4 swede, diced', '3 medium potatoes, diced', '1 big red onion, chopped', '850ml beef stock (2 cubes)', '8 grinds black pepper', '2 pinches sea salt', '3/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '70g plain flour', '350ml cold water']
